attributes.action: Change the management in this YMCA
attributes.additional_details: carry an investigation at the YMCA NORTH LONDON in order to change their bad habits.
attributes.background:
Carry an investigation at the YMCA NORTH LONDON.
Introduce new staff to the building in order to have professionals members of staff that will follow protocols.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for the organisation, not the UK Government or Parliament.
